news.title: Trust these numbers? Economists see a lot of flaws in delayed CPI report showing downward inflation
news.description: Thursday saw the release of a much lighter-than-expected inflation report for November, and economists are already questioning its significance.

news.title: Friday could be a wild day of trading on Wall Street. Here's why
news.description: December options expirations are typically the biggest of the year, but this one eclipses all prior records, Goldman said.

news.title: Trump signs executive order reclassifying cannabis, opening door to broader weed access
news.description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday reclassifying marijuana as a Schedule III substance with looser restrictions.

news.title: American Airlines no longer lets basic economy flyers earn miles
news.description: Starting this week, American Airlines will no longer reward customers with miles for basic economy tickets.

news.title: S&P 500 rises on cooler-than-expected inflation data, strong Micron earnings: Live updates
news.description: Stocks rose on Thursday as Wall Street weighed the latest inflation data, which came in lighter than expected.

news.title: Why BlackRock thinks the time is right for a more 'modernized' exposure to bonds
news.description: Amid a 'generational opportunity' in fixed income, BlackRock recently launched an ETF that it says has the most comprehensive exposure to the market ever.

news.title: Here are four key takeaways from Europe's central banks' final rate decisions of 2025
news.description: The ECB, Norges Bank, and Riksbank all held while the BOE cut as expected. But there are hints of what lies ahead.

news.title: Putin ally Viktor Orbán tells CNBC using frozen Russian assets is a 'dead end'
news.description: European officials are trying to convince a handful of EU member countries to back controversial plans for providing more financial support to Ukraine.

news.title: Nvidia and Alphabet VC arms back vibe coding startup Lovable at $6.6 billion valuation
news.description: The announcement confirms details reported by CNBC on Tuesday.

news.title: Bank of Japan is poised to raise rates to a 30-year high despite economic weakness
news.description: Experts say that investors should look for the BOJ's communication around its terminal rate, pace of rate hikes, and the weak yen.

news.title: Bank of England cuts interest rates, in welcome Christmas boost for consumers
news.description: The Bank of England voted to cut interest rates from 4% to 3.75% in its last monetary policy move of 2025.

news.title: European Central Bank holds rates steady in last gathering of 2025
news.description: The European Central Bank, Bank of England, Riksbank and Norges Bank all met on Thursday.

news.title: Fusion deal: Why Trump Media is merging with TAE Technologies
news.description: TAE Technologies says the strong balance sheet of TMTG will provide the capital needed to bring its first fusion power plant online in the U.S. by 2031.

news.title: Billionaire investor Ron Baron is betting on a big spending mistake by the market, and it's not related to AI
news.description: Billionaire fund manager Ron Baron says the market is penalizing many companies for spending to boost their growth, and these are the stocks he wants to own.

news.title: November consumer prices rose at a 2.7% annual rate, lower than expected, delayed data shows
news.description: Economists polled by Dow Jones expected CPI to have risen 3.1% on an annualized basis.

news.title: Olive Garden owner Darden Restaurants hikes revenue outlook as value plays help bring in diners
news.description: Darden Restaurants reported strong demand for Olive Garden and LongHorn Steakhouse.

news.title: November's inflation report is the first to be released after the shutdown. Here's what to expect
news.description: November's CPI report is expected to show the annual inflation rate at 3.1%, according to economists polled by Dow Jones.

news.title: Watch Fed Governor Christopher Waller speak on interest rates and the race to succeed Powell
news.description: Waller is one of the five finalists considered for to replace Fed Chairman Jerome Powell when his term expires in May.

news.title: Hassett says Fed independence is ‘really important’ and chair candidates shouldn’t be disqualified for being Trump’s friend
news.description: Hassett declined in a CNBC interview to directly address his own candidacy but said forging consensus is an important part of the job.

news.title: Jim Cramer urges discipline on GE Vernova as Wall Street analysts get more bullish
news.description: Volatile trading in GE Vernova stock recently epitomizes the fickle nature of the AI trade.

news.title: Micron stock pops 12% as AI memory demand soars: 'We are more than sold out'
news.description: Micron said it expects the total addressable market for high-bandwidth memory to hit $100 billion by 2028.

news.title: Trump defends economy, CPI report returns, monster Medline IPO, and more in Morning Squawk
news.description: Here are five key things investors need to know to start the trading day.

news.title: Visa says new AI shopping tool has helped customers with hundreds of transactions
news.description: Visa said it successfully completed hundreds of AI transactions as part of a pilot program it kicked off after a product event in April.

news.title: CNBC Daily Open: Oracle's debt seems to be affecting data center funding
news.description: Despite the recent pullback in artificial intelligence stocks, the Bank of America thinks "the AI trade may still have room to run into 2026."

news.title: Kennedy Center to be renamed 'Trump-Kennedy Center,' White House says
news.description: The John F. Kennedy Memorial Center for the Performing Arts will be renamed the "Trump-Kennedy Center," White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said.

news.title: Trump Media announces $6 billion merger with fusion company TAE Technologies; DJT stock soars 33%
news.description: Trump Media and Technology Group announced a merger agreement with fusion power company TAE Technologies valued at more than $6 billion.

news.title: Trump announces 'warrior dividend' of $1,776 to every U.S. soldier in prime-time speech
news.description: Trump highlighted his administration's efforts to seal the southern border, bring down costs and strengthen U.S. foreign policy.

news.title: Trump tariffs: Small businesses take on high-interest rate loans to cover new costs
news.description: Even if the Supreme Court rules Trump tariffs are illegal, high interest rates and fees on predatory loans are leaving some businesses facing years of debt.

news.title: Senate confirms private astronaut, Musk ally Jared Isaacman as NASA chief
news.description: The U.S. Senate on Wednesday confirmed billionaire private astronaut Jared Isaacman to become President Donald Trump's NASA administrator, making an advocate of Mars missions and a former associate of SpaceX CEO Elon Musk the space agency's 15th leader.
